name: Eiroa - Classic - 40 x 4
additionalNotes: The EIROA Cigar by Christian Eiroa has a band that says "Salud, Amor y Pesetas", which is an old Spanish saying that means "Health, Love, and Wealth". The band represents Eiroa's homage to his heritage that started with his grandfather and spans 100 years of love for making cigars. Â The EIROA cigar is made in Danli, Honduras at the Aladino Factory and uses Honduran tobacco for a bold, full bodied flavor.
